item.title: Quick tip: Elasticsearch + Consul + health check + basic authentication
item.description: Recently, I’ve been installing the “Elastic Stack”, previously known as ELK, and one of the steps took me a while to figure it out, due to outdated documentation and missing pieces in the examples for the specific syntax that you need to get right, so here it comes: Imagine you have already gone through the Elastic Stack quick start and you have it secured with basic authentication, either directly through the configuration or through the recommended X-Pack plugin.
